items.name: Proton Pack
items.description: This is a Proton pack. Despite all it's damage and use it's never let you down.

items.name: Closet
items.decription: This is a closet. Within it lies several stationaries and cobwebs.

items.name: Vaccum
items.description: This is old vaccum. It's loud and clunky, you should really buy a new one.

items.name: Scissors
items.description: This is a pair of scissors. What else did you expect?

items.name: Rope
items.description: This is a coarse bundle of rope. It's length is immeseruable and it seems to go on for infinity.

items.name: House Key
items.description: This is your housekey. A keychain with the logo of the hit blockbuster movie 'Spook Chasers' hangs off the end.

items.name: Office Key
items.description: This is a key to your office. 'I <3 polymorphisim' is engraved on the side.

items.name: Abandoned House Key
items.description: This is an old key. It seems much older than any of your other ones and rust is starting to develop on the ends.
